blogPost.excerpt: Leadsie helps marketing freelancers & agencies get access to their clients’ Facebook assets & Google Analytics without hassle. ✅ Impress your clients with how fast you can start delivering them value. And stop wasting time getting access. 💪
blogPost.body: Leadsie helps marketing freelancers & agencies get access to their clients’ Facebook assets & Google Analytics without hassle. ✅ Impress your clients with how fast you can start delivering them value. And stop wasting time getting access. 💪
blogPost.title: Leadsie Connect - 2-click access to Facebook & Google Analytics ✅
blogPost.author: Tristan Pollock

localize.description: Leadsie帮助营销自由职业者和代理公司无忧无虑地访问客户的Facebook资产和谷歌分析。✅ 让您的客户印象深刻，您可以如此快速地开始为他们提供价值。而不再浪费时间去获取。💪
Leadsie幫助營銷自由職業者和代理公司無憂無慮地訪問客戶的Facebook資產和谷歌分析。✅ 讓您的客戶印象深刻，您可以如此快速地開始爲他們提供價值。而不再浪費時間去獲取。💪

previous.excerpt: Dive is a platform where you can match with people from all over the world to get work done, increase sense of responsibility and motivation.
previous.title: Dive - Write your task, match with people, get it done

localize.description: 潜水是一个平台，在这个平台上，你可以与来自世界各地的人进行匹配，完成工作，增加责任感和动力。
潛水是一個平臺，在這個平臺上，你可以與來自世界各地的人進行匹配，完成工作，增加責任感和動力。

next.excerpt: Snaptrude is a next-gen 3D design tool for the construction industry. It helps Architects design efficient & sustainable buildings 10x faster on the web. It saves weeks’ worth of efforts as compared to legacy tools owing to its automation & data powered core.
next.title: Snaptrude - Design efficient buildings in 3D, 10x faster from the web

localize.description: Snaptrude是建筑行业的下一代3D设计工具。它可以帮助建筑师在网络上以10倍的速度设计高效和可持续的建筑。由于其自动化和数据驱动的核心，与传统工具相比，它可以节省数周的努力。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式设计高效建筑，从网络上看，速度快10倍

localize.description: Snaptrude是建築行業的下一代3D設計工具。它可以幫助建築師在網絡上以10倍的速度設計高效和可持續的建築。由於其自動化和數據驅動的核心，與傳統工具相比，它可以節省數週的努力。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式設計高效建築，從網絡上看，速度快10倍
